title: AI Engineering Intern - Goldenset
description: Contributed to the Apollo AI service in the Titans monorepo. Improved CSV-to-RAG pipelines, token-based chunking, and multi-provider LLM integration (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini). Added tests and validation with PyTest, and supported code reviews, PR discussions, and production debugging.

title: IT Intern - DKSH Malaysia
description: Implemented a SharePoint and JavaScript electronic document signing system to reduce approval time and streamline review workflows. Collected and maintained technical documentation for configurations, workflows, and user guides to support IT operations and onboarding.
